Next, we need to define the basis functions. Since we are using linear triangular elements, we will use the hat functions as our basis functions. For a given node (i, j), the hat function Ï†_ij is defined as:

To find the coefficients c_ij, we will use the Galerkin method, which requires that the residual of the PDE is orthogonal to the basis functions. The residual is given by:
